delay_react.utt: you have to go to living room if you have been to kitchen
go to kitchen means you have to go to bathroom in the future

future_avoid.utt: don't go to bedroom if you have entered bathroom
go to bathroom means you cannot go to living room

past_avoid.utt: you have to enter bedroom before going into living room
don't go to bathroom if you haven't been to kitchen

prompt_react.utt: you have to go to bedroom right after living room
go to bedroom means you have to go to bathroom immediately after that

upper_rest_avoid.ltl: ! F & bedroom U bedroom & ! bedroom U ! bedroom F & bedroom U bedroom & ! bedroom U ! bedroom F bedroom
upper_rest_avoid.utt: don't go to bedroom more than two times

upper_rest_avoid.ltl: ! F & kitchen U kitchen & ! kitchen U ! kitchen F & kitchen U kitchen & ! kitchen U ! kitchen F & kitchen U kitchen & ! kitchen U ! kitchen F kitchen
upper_rest_avoid.utt: you can walk past kitchen table up to three times

upper_rest_avoid.ltl: ! F & bedroom U bedroom & ! bedroom U ! bedroom F bedroom
